programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Soon two-thirds of the global population will be living in cities, leaving wild animals to develop a whole new set of street smarts. Whether that’s a hungry bear raiding a supermarket, a street gang of monkeys committing daylight robbery, or a raccoon figuring out how to open a wildlife-proof bin - from Delhi to New York, these guys will stop at nothing.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Every year, more and more people head to the ocean to swim, sail, fish or scuba, and every year, more and more of us experience astonishing wild encounters that go viral. Want to know why an octopus would slap a kayaker or why a sea snake might want to be best friends? Take a deep dive into some of the craziest clips to discover what’s really going on.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind T1 - Ep. 4
programme.desc: Safaris are a great way to meet some of the planet’s most iconic animals, but sometimes, the wildlife gets a little too close for comfort. From a lion invading a tent to a testosterone-fueled elephant charging down a truck, it’s no wonder these clips go viral. Buckle up for a wild ride to discover why these animals are just doing what comes naturally.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly T1 - Ep. 5
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetles boiling spray to the mantis shrimps explosive club and the draco lizard’s hidden wings, meet natures awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Killer Safari T2 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: The lines between hunter and hunted become blurred in this epic safari. Hold on to your seats as an elephant charges through the bush with a lion dangling from its tusks. Watch as male leopards engage in a turf war, and a pack of hyenas bully a lion off of his buffalo kill. The safari intensifies as a leopard, wild dogs and hyenas fight for the same kill in an astonishing display of raw nature.

programme.title: National Parks: USA T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: In the wake of the largest volcanic eruption of the 1900s, an exploration by National Geographic led to the founding of Katmai National Park. From the volcanic ashes, the landscape regenerated, and a vibrant assembly of wildlife emerged. Witness the annual journey of brown bears, wolves, and salmon within the park.

programme.title: Killer Safari T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: National Parks: USA T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Zions iconic landscapes feature soaring red spires against a clear blue sky. Beyond canyons and cliffs, water emerges as a surprising force. The humble Virgin River, sculpting a geologic masterpiece over millennia, sustains diverse life in Zion National Park. Climbers, bighorn sheep, wild turkeys, and globe mallow bees all find refuge alongside this flowing lifeline.

programme.title: National Parks: USA T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Experience a year in Yellowstone, the worlds first national park. Meet remarkable wildlife, from the steadfast Wapiti wolves and resilient bison to playful grizzly cubs. Discover the parks indigenous heritage, ecological diversity, and geological wonders. Home to the largest collection of geysers on the planet, this American trailblazer shapes how we value and safeguard our most precious lands. .

programme.title: Killer Safari T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: When the savannah turns into a battleground, it’s hard to choose a hero. We’re on the edge of our safari seats as a leopard is cornered by a pride of lions, a young impala is hurled into the air by a hippo and two hyenas try to drown each other. Then, the rarest of sightings as an Aardvark runs for its life from a brown hyaena. Who will win when it’s tooth versus claw?.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T18 - Ep. 20
programme.desc: The PVS staff make sure every animal has a fighting chance. From tiny puppies and rabbits, large cows and horses, and creepy crawlies, on this episode of The Incredible Dr. Pol, it’s a fun mix of, “aww,” “wow,” and “yuck!” The vets are out on farms calls! Dr. Pol tangles with a feisty angus bull, pregnancy checks a herd at House Dairy, and pays a visit to Clay Knob to look at a cow with a peculiar problem. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T19 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Dr. Pol and the team are buzzing in the clinic with two Labradors needing lab work, a check-up with a speedy bearded dragon, and a Pit Bull puppy involved in a brutal accident. Cases ranging from a volleyball-sized cyst to an injured horse leg keep the vets preoccupied in the field.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Polar Bears T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Dennis, a bear guide and Churchill local, puts his skills to the ultimate test as he searches the unforgiving Manitoba wilderness for a polar bear den in hopes of capturing the first moments of a cub’s life in the wild. Meanwhile on the tundra, a pregnant mother bear returns to the land where she and her ancestors were born.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Polar Bears T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Dennis follows the mother bear and her two cubs by snowmobile as they reach the shores of Hudson Bay at last. As the precarious ice and food shortage threatens mother bear’s ability to teach her cubs to survive and thrive, the hungry family are confronted with even bigger challenges than before.

programme.desc: Crows are as smart as dolphins and can talk like parrots. Wolves can hunt for three days straight in a territory the size of Delaware..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 5
programme.desc: Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: On the African Plains, the American Highlands, and the Desert Badlands, Animal Fight Night exposes nature, red in tooth and claw. Lions go head to head, a Grey Wolf pack takes on a Grizzly, Hippos hammer out a violent battle, and one of the worlds largest monkeys plans a mission to murder. Lust, Jealousy, and Pure Rage fuel deadly encounters in the wild, as the natural world shows its savage side.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 5
programme.desc: Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Whether right whales, penguins or sea lions - for the birth of their young, many marine creatures are drawn to Argentinas nearly 5,000 kilometer coastline. From their very first breath, its all about one thing for the little ones: survival. Orcas hunt for young sea lions with a special technique and seagulls fly merciless aerial attacks on baby whales.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth T1 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: In Argentinas breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. And then there are the predators. A female puma stalks a valley in search of guanaco, while a tarantula defends itself against a hungry armadillo. Foxes will scavenge what they can…until one of the world’s largest vultures shows up.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: On the African Plains, the American Highlands, and the Desert Badlands, Animal Fight Night exposes nature, red in tooth and claw. Lions go head to head, a Grey Wolf pack takes on a Grizzly, Hippos hammer out a violent battle, and one of the worlds largest monkeys plans a mission to murder. Lust, Jealousy, and Pure Rage fuel deadly encounters in the wild, as the natural world shows its savage side.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: The plains of Africa are home to natures most fearsome predators - Cheetahs, Lions, Hyenas. But the battle for survival is never one sided, even the prey animals are formidable. We see a mother cheetah come face to face with the heavy weaponry of a Grants Gazelle, and unpack what happens when three male lions make the mistake of their lives, and try to take down a pugnacious Rhino..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: In an action packed episode of Animal Fight Club we reveal what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most vicious species fight tooth and claw in the deadliest of conflicts. With exclusive user generated content and footage from top wildlife filmmakers, this episode sheds new light on the fiercest fights Mother Nature has to offer, proving that its not always the animal you expect that ends up coming out on top ….

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 4
programme.desc: Natures vicious battles for survival come at every scale, from 6 ton Elephants, fighting in a testosterone fuelled blind fury, to slime covered inch and half long amphibian kick boxers, dangling in the jaws of death. This is a no-holds barred look at cold-hearted killers in the wild, revealing ambush experts with piercing canines, slithering assassins with crushing coils, and multi-layered fangs dealing death, in Animal Fight Club..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club T4 - Ep. 5
programme.desc: Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T19 - Ep. 2
programme.desc: On this episode of The Incredible Dr. Pol, Doc dodges kicks from a choking mare, Dr. Brenda hoofs it to a limping cow, and Dr. Lisa treats a wobbly steer. At the clinic, the docs face a deluge of dogs: a Chihuahua with a broken leg, a pregnant pooch that looks ready to burst, and a Doberman with mysterious bumps on his face. From mules to mutts, the vets have it covered.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol T19 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: The vets at PVS tackle a range of summertime sores, from a guinea pig with an abscess, to a reindeer with an unusual scab. A German Shepherd with severe lacerations and a puppy with an eye injury needs Dr. Nicole’s expertise. Dr. Pol works his magic on a down cow and a cat that was hit by a car. Ten adorable puppies get health checks and a mini horse is in urgent need of help.

programme.title: Freaks And Creeps T1 - Ep. 3
programme.desc: Typically South Africa is known for the Big Five: lions, leopards, buffalo, elephants and rhinos. But not for Lucy Cooke, advocate and avenger for the lesser-known and unloved animals of the world. Lucys on a hunt for the more enigmatic Freaky Five: Cape vultures, sungazer girdled lizards, golden-brown baboon tarantulas, ground pangolins, and chacma baboons. The Freaky Five are all important to South Africans and their traditions.

programme.title: Freaks And Creeps T1 - Ep. 1
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange.
